title: marlincdm_json_initdata_createdecryptunit
description: Marlin Content Decryption Module json initData for createDecryptUnit function

version.description: version number of marlin cdm initdata format

cenc.descripion: information for license load from cenc data. this property is required if data_type is cenc

license_embedded.description: license embedded flag. If it is true, license is embedded in pssh box

pssh.description: pssh box which is Base64 encoded from the byte array

kids.description: kid parameters for explicit mapping case

sessionid.description: cdm session id aquired from mediadrm to connect crypto with key

ipmp.descripion: information for license load from ipmp data. this property is required if data_type is ipmp

sinf.description: sinf box which is Base64-encoded string from the byte array
